questions.content: P(A) = Number of favorable outcomes / Total outcomes
questions.explanation: This is the fundamental definition of probability
This is the formula for conditional probability
This is the combination formula for choosing r items from n

questions.content: P(A ∪ B) = P(A) + P(B) - P(A ∩ B)
questions.explanation: This is the addition rule for probability of union

questions.content: If A and B are independent: P(A|B) = P(A)
questions.explanation: Independence means the conditional probability equals the original probability
This is the permutation formula for arranging r items from n
The probability of the complement equals 1 minus the original probability
